item.title: Getting started with jackson
item.description: Setup # Jackson is a Java JSON library. As such, setting it up is as simple as adding it to the classpath of the Java project where its usage is intented. Firstly, the jars need to be downloaded to a location on the local disk: jackson-core jackson-annotations (leverages annotation usage) jackson-databind (general data-binding functionality) They can be found for download in one of the central Maven repositories, under the com.fasterxml.jackson.core group:
